tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE hydropower_equipment (
    equipment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_name VARCHAR(255),
    maintenance_schedule VARCHAR(255),
    service_history JSON
)

CREATE TABLE service_history (
  service_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  equipment_id INT,
  service_date DATE,
  service_type VARCHAR(50),
  service_notes TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (equipment_id) REFERENCES maintenance_schedule(equipment_id)
);

CREATE TABLE maintenance_schedule (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_id INT,
    maintenance_date DATE,
    maintenance_type VARCHAR(50),
    technician_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE equipment (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_name VARCHAR(50),
    location VARCHAR(100),
    installation_date DATE,
    maintenance_frequency INT
);

CREATE TABLE service_history (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_id INT,
    service_date DATE,
    service_details TEXT,
    service_cost DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE maintenance_schedule (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_id INT,
    maintenance_type VARCHAR(50),
    scheduled_date DATE,
    completed BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE service_history (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    maintenance_id INT,
    service_date DATE,
    service_description TEXT,
    technician_name VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE equipment (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_name VARCHAR(50),
    manufacturer VARCHAR(50),
    installation_date DATE,
    last_service_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE maintenance_schedule (
    schedule_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_id UUID NOT NULL,
    maintenance_type VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    maintenance_date DATE NOT NULL,
    maintenance_notes VARCHAR(500),
    FOREIGN KEY (equipment_id) REFERENCES equipment(equipment_id)
);

CREATE TABLE service_history (
    service_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_id UUID NOT NULL,
    service_date DATE NOT NULL,
    service_type VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    service_notes VARCHAR(500),
    FOREIGN KEY (equipment_id) REFERENCES equipment(equipment_id)
);

CREATE TABLE equipment (
    equipment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    equipment_type VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    installation_date DATE NOT NULL,
    manufacturer VARCHAR(255),
    service_interval INT,
    last_service_date DATE,
    next_service_date DATE,
);
